data.name: Endless Melody: The Symphony of Angels
data.detailed_description:
Story
Endless Melody is a JRPG with a winding and unpredictable story. It follows several main characters who find themselves tied up in events they can’t escape from. They all struggle with identity to some degree, “who am I?”, “where do I come from?”, “where do I go from here?”

At the core of it though, it is a story about life, love, and acceptance. The characters find themselves in a world after a disastrous event killed millions of people across the land. Set 15 years after, they try to uncover what caused it, and what best to do with that information.

With many new characters, several characters from the fan beloved JRPG “Gaia’s Melody” make a return appearance as playable characters, adding Akira, Zephyre, Doken, and Whyp to the story.

So, I say this to those who protect this world, "Let Gaia’s final battle begin.”

Style
Endless Melody is a Dynamic Turn based game. This means that players and monsters will have turns based on their Agi (Agility) stat, but without the obscene boredom of an active time battle. The battles progress quickly and smoothly. Players even have extra attacks per turn based on their level, or weapons equipped. Skills progress via a classic level up system, while magic can be equipped with the use of Crests. Also, players and enemies move around the battlefield during combat, so no more just attacking air and then moving back to the home position.

Features
•A dynamic and fast paced battle system
•Character Skits
•An animal companion
•Map monster encounters (no random battles YAY!)
•In-game & Steam Achievements
•Several playable characters
•An actual full length JRPG

▽ Meet the Characters ▽



Fighter is the hero of the story. A tragic past robbed him of his memories, and he was brought into an ancient organization known as the Brotherhood of Eternity. He has a younger sister named Amicia who he raises when he is not training. He’s also a bit of a pervert.

Amicia is Fighter’s little sister. She struggles to understand herself and her feelings in a world which is falling apart around her. She’s not the toughest girl out there, but she will never give up on you.

Fate is a flying cat who befriends Fighter early on. He’s rude, he’s crude – but he’s a swell… cat. Someday though he’ll need to cat up and become the kitty he was destined to be. For now though he enjoys just hanging out with Fighter and Amicia.

Medley is a character who starts the story sure of where she stands, and gradually becomes doubtful of her having actually known anything. Though, nothing can get this girl down for long; soon she’ll be the hero the worlds deserve, but not the one it needs.

Also featuring Erynn, a princess of Eeon, Amelia, Nisha, Sadie and Kachie, the Light Warriors of Ivylan and the returning villain of the week – Agares.

data.short_description: Follow Fighter, a regular guy who finds himself caught up in world changing events as he learns about friendship, love, and about himself. His sister, Amicia, a young girl with a tragic past searching for the answer to everyone’s big questions: “Where do I come from?” & “Where do I go from here?”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window8
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU/ I28MB or higher Integraged Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Install to an SSD for faster load times
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i5, Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Install to an SSD for faster load times
